original_text: Then Amaziah separated them, to wit, the army that was come to him out of Ephraim, to go home again: wherefore their anger was greatly kindled against Judah, and they returned home in great anger.
korean_text: 아마샤가 이에 에브라임에서 자기에게 온 군대를 나누어 그들의 고향으로 돌아가게 하였더니 그 무리가 유다 사람에게 심히 노하여 분연히 고향으로 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: to wit, the army that was come to him out of Ephraim
wherefore their anger was greatly kindled against Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그들의 분노가 유다를 향해 크게 일어났고

sentences.original_text: and they returned home in great anger
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 큰 분노를 품고 집으로 돌아갔음
